## Welcome!

This website is build by [Mary Ma](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xiaoyue-mary-ma/) through R and hosted by [github](https://github.com/doubbymary/doubbymary.github.io). Feel free to browse around and click the links above to know more about myself.

In this webiste I included my personal resume at the __professiona experience__ tab; an data visualization page of ["The Instacart Online Grocery Shopping Dataset 2017"](https://www.instacart.com/datasets/grocery-shopping-2017) created with `plotly` and `flex dashboard`; a link to my old personal website created purely through `html` and `css`.
